contentList.content: Launch a mote of light at a target. Until the end of your next turn, the target emits dim light a [1] radius and cannot benefit from the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> condition.
Shedding dim light a [1] radius and cannot benefit from the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> condition.
